name: IDA Brussels
goal:
IDA Group is a highly specialized consultancy for governmental affairs, reputation management, trade and funding. We share the belief in effective dialogue built upon trust and mutual understanding. Our language is clear, our concepts convince and our ideas inspire.

From our offices in Brussels, Berlin, Beijing, London, Sao Paulo, Shanghai, Hong Kong, Ottawa and Tokyo we support clients to communicate strategically, influence legislation, resolve issues, change regulation, enter new markets or overcome trade barriers.
Our diverse team of experts includes seasoned diplomats, politicians, journalists, lawyers and designers. Our efforts are supported by a global network of trusted partners.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Budget, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
